availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mason James Goatly (Washington County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet Rebecca Dickerson Goatly in Washington County, Kentucky, on July 23, 1846. Father of Henry Goatly, Palmer Goatly, Julia Ann Goatly, James Goatly, Hugh Goatly, Martha Goatly, and Emma Goatly. Farmer in Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Washington, p. 195B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District 2, p. 43.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Glenville, p. 302B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film #000551244, p. 310.
"Mason James Goatly (1822-1874)," Find A Grave, Memorial #43106809, accessed August 22, 2022.
